precondition: The Windows 98 desktop is visible.
action: Click the 'My Computer' icon on the desktop.
expected_results: The 'My Computer' window will open, displaying your drives and system folders.

precondition: The "My Computer" window is open. The icon labeled "Cdrom (D:)" is visible.
expected_results: A window titled "Cdrom (D:)" will open, displaying the contents of the CD-ROM drive. A new button labeled "Cdrom (D:)" will appear in the taskbar.

precondition: The "Cdrom (D:)" window is open, displaying a file named "cc32d479.exe."
action: Click once on the "cc32d479.exe" file icon.
expected_results: The Netscape Communicator 4.79 setup window will open, displaying a welcome message and setup options.

precondition: The 'Netscape Communicator 4.79 Setup' window is open, displaying a welcome message and the 'Next >' and 'Cancel' buttons.
expected_results: The 'Software License Agreement' screen will appear, displaying the Netscape Client Products End-User License Agreement. The 'Next >' and 'Cancel' buttons will be replaced with '< Back', 'Yes', and 'No' buttons.

precondition: The "Software License Agreement" dialog box for Netscape Communicator 4.79 is open, displaying the license agreement text and three buttons: '< Back', 'Yes', and 'No'.
expected_results: The "Software License Agreement" dialog box will close, and the "Setup Type" window for Netscape Communicator 4.79 will appear. This window allows you to choose between 'Typical' and 'Custom' installations.

precondition: The 'Setup Type' window is open, displaying the 'Typical' and 'Custom' installation options, the destination directory, and the 'Next >' button is enabled.
expected_results: A dialog box titled 'Question' will appear, stating that the selected installation directory does not exist and asking if you want to create it. The dialog box will offer 'Yes' and 'No' buttons.

precondition: A dialog box titled 'Question' is open, stating that the directory 'C:\Program Files\Netscape\Communicator' does not exist.
expected_results: The 'Question' dialog box will close, and the 'Netscape Desktop Preference Options' dialog box will open.

precondition: The "Netscape Desktop Preference Options" window is open, displaying options for default browser, home page, and web search.
action: Click the "Next >" button at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Netscape Desktop Preference Options" window will be replaced by the "Select Program Folder" window, where you can choose the installation directory.

precondition: The "Select Program Folder" window is open, displaying the desired installation path in the "Program Folder:" text box.
expected_results: The "Select Program Folder" window will close, and the "Start Copying Files" window will appear, indicating the next stage of the installation process.

precondition: The "Start Copying Files" window is open, and the "Install >" button is visible.
expected_results: A dialog box titled "Question" will appear with "Yes" and "No" buttons. The "Yes" button will be selected by default.

precondition: A dialog box titled "Question" is open, asking "Would you like to view the README file now?"
expected_results: The "Question" dialog box will be replaced with an "Information" dialog box. The new dialog box will display the message "Setup is complete. You may run Netscape Communicator 4.79 by double-clicking on one of the icons in the folder."

precondition: A dialog box titled 'Information' with an 'OK' button is visible.
expected_results: The 'Information' dialog box will close.

precondition: The Netscape Communicator 4.79 application window is open and visible on the desktop.
action: Click and drag the title bar of the Netscape Communicator window to the desired location.
expected_results: The Netscape Communicator window will be moved to the new location.

precondition: The window titled 'Netscape Communicator' is open.
action: Click the close button (✕) in the title bar of the 'Netscape Communicator' window.
expected_results: The 'Netscape Communicator' window will close and be minimized to the taskbar as 'Netscape Co...'.

precondition: The window titled 'Cdrom (D:)' is open and in focus.
action: Click the close button (✕) in the top right corner of the 'Cdrom (D:)' window.
expected_results: The 'Cdrom (D:)' window will close.

precondition: The Windows 98 desktop is visible with the 'Netscape Communicator' icon present.
action: Left Click on the desktop, in an empty area free of icons.
expected_results: No immediate visual change is expected.

precondition: The "Netscape Communicator" shortcut icon is visible on the Windows 98 desktop.
action: Click the "Netscape Communicator" shortcut icon on the desktop.
expected_results: A dialog box titled "Creating a New Profile" will appear.

precondition: The "Creating a New Profile" dialog box is open, and the "Next >" button is highlighted.
expected_results: The "Enter Your Name and Email Address" dialog box will appear.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open with the "Next >" button visible.
expected_results: No visible change will occur in the user interface.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open.
action: Type the letter "o" into the "Full Name" field.
expected_results: The letter "o" will appear in the "Full Name" field.

precondition: A dialog box titled "Enter your Name and Email Address" is displayed.
expected_results: The dialog box should revert to the previous step in the installation process.

precondition: The dialog box titled "Enter your Name and Email Address" is open.
expected_results: No visible changes will occur in the user interface.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open.
action: Type the letter "A" in the "Full Name" field.
expected_results: The letter "A" will appear in the "Full Name" field.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open.
action: Type the letters "li" into the "Full Name:" text field.
expected_results: The letters "li" will appear in the "Full Name:" text field.

precondition: The dialog box titled "Enter your Name and Email Address" is displayed.
expected_results: The letters "ce" will appear in the "Email Address:" field.

precondition: A dialog box titled "Enter your Name and Email Address" is displayed, containing the fields "Full Name:" and "Email Address:".
action: Type the letter 's' into the "Full Name:" field.
expected_results: The letter 's' will appear in the "Full Name:" field.

precondition: A dialog box titled "Enter your Name and Email Address" is open. The text field labeled "Full Name:" contains the pre-filled placeholder "Bob Alicesd".
action: Type the letters "on" using your keyboard.
expected_results: The text in the "Full Name:" field will be updated to include the typed letters.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open, with the 'Next >' button visible.
expected_results: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box will be replaced by the "Choose a Name and Directory for your Profile" dialog box. The new dialog box will display a 'Profile Name' field, a directory path, and the buttons '< Back', 'Next >', 'Finish', and 'Cancel'.

precondition: The "Choose a Name and Directory for your Profile" dialog box is open with the "Next >" button available.
expected_results: The "Choose a Name and Directory for your Profile" dialog box will be replaced with the "Set up your Outgoing Mail Server" dialog box. The new dialog box will contain a text field pre-filled with the word "mail", and the buttons "< Back", "Next >", "Finish", and "Cancel", with the "Next >" button highlighted.

precondition: The "Set up your Outgoing Mail Server" dialog box is open with the "Outgoing mail (SMTP) server:" field visible.
expected_results: The "Set up your Outgoing Mail Server" dialog box will be replaced with a "Netscape" dialog box displaying an error message that states: "Netscape is unable to locate the server home.netscape.com. Please check the server name and try again." An "OK" button will be available in the dialog box.

precondition: A pop-up window titled "Netscape" displays an error message stating "Netscape is unable to locate the server home.netscape.com. Please check the server name and try again." An "OK" button is present at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Netscape" pop-up window will disappear. The bottom of the main window will display the error message "Unable to locate host home.netscape.com."
